column1:
share on x sp sister joyce ann panos. jun 21 at 10:32 am to all the children of adelyne panos: my sister, bernice called to tell me of adelyne' passing. i always admired her energy, strength, out going personality and her helpfulness in any situation. we share many good times together. i am unable to make it for the funeral but be assured of my prayers and the prayers of al the sisters here in my community in milwaukee, wi. god bless you all with the strength you need to carry on your mon's good example of service to others. prayerfully, sister joyce ann panos. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe hugeback-johnson funeral home and cremation services website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
